author: cartesina
title: Romantic London weekend
text:
Me and my boyfriend stayed at the Novotel for a weekend. Everything was great, friendly atmosphere, friendly staff, good food and in particular great cocktail to end the perfect day!
Special thanks to Daniel at the bar, who surprised my boyfriend with an amazing old fashion with a really nice explanation. I would strongly recommend this hotel!!
